00061         status = rt_task_create(&robotserver_data_task, "robotserver_data_task", ROBOTSERVER_TASK_DATA_STACK, ROBOTSERVER_TASK_DATA_PRIORITY, T_JOINABLE);
00062         if (status != 0) {
00063                 printf("    Criacao do thread 'robotserver_data_task' falhou: ");
00064                 if(status == (-ENOMEM)) printf("-ENOMEM\n");
00065                 if(status == (-EEXIST)) printf("-EEXIST\n");
00066                 if(status == (-EPERM)) printf("-EPERM\n");
00067                 status = rt_task_delete(&robotserver_data_task);
00068                 if (status != 0) {
00069                         printf("    Falha na tentativa de deletar 'robotserver_data_task'.\n");

00071                 return 0;
